segments.text: My eyes are drawn immediately to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s really stretching, his whole body tense as he reaches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out, tilted at such a dangerous angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backward, sending him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could seriously hurt himself, falling onto that hard floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is right there, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just looking up with such innocent expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and drops that plate too?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of breaking ceramic would surely alert the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s still polishing that plate, utterly oblivious to the imminent danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle under her feet is also a slip hazard for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope someone intervenes before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
